A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Hi\, I am Rian Johnson and I wrote the apologetic review that begins with "This will be my final review of Star Wars: The Last Jedi" that I signed it with the name "John C".
It is time for everyone to know that it was me.
You already noticed that I feel compelled to explain what I did with the movie because I was not able to express it while I was making it.
I am an amateur movie director. I have done only two movies before The Last Jedi and an episode of Breaking Bad which is\, by any means\, the worse episode of the series.
I think Kathy hired me because she knew that I would have crapped in my pants and that the movie would have been a disaster.
She wanted exactly that.
Now I know and I apologize. I didn't want to hurt anyone. I hope that someone will give me the opportunity to do other movies\, although no one will pay for watching them.
